name: Noxium
description:
Welcome to your new job mining Noxium for a sketchy business. Keep the power on and everything should be fine. Noxium can only be traded at night, hence why we need someone like you to keep the operation running throughout the night. We have cameras setup throughout the warehouse so you can keep an eye on everything. Good luck!

Manage

Use the terminal throughout the nights to manage the Noxium mining operation. Keep all of the servers online for maximum mining efficiency. Occasionally the servers will have problems and you will have to diagnose the issue and fix them.

Monitor

There are 4 cameras scattered throughout the warehouse. Keep an eye out for anything strange that might halt or slow down the Noxium mining operation.

Survive

There are a few threats you will face throughout the nights. Stay alert, any single moment could become your last.
